# Sponsors

Do you or your company use GoReleaser?
You can help keep the project bug-free and feature rich by sponsoring the
project and its maintainers.

## Sponsor via GitHub or OpenCollective

You can sponsor GoReleaser via:
- **[GitHub Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/caarlos0)** - Support the maintainer directly
- **[OpenCollective](https://opencollective.com/goreleaser)** - Support the organization (domains, servers, stickers, etc.)

Below is a unified list of all current sponsors and backers from both platforms:
